name: Sm’hohck-haigh, the Ancient One of Wildfires
name_original: Sm’hohck-haigh, the Ancient One of Wildfires
description:
How to Play

  • WASD to move your character up, left, down, and right. Spacebar to jump.
  • Bump into the trees to set them on fire.
  • Try to find and set on fire all 20 trees located on the map.
  • Do not worry about falling off the edge of the map, there are invisible barriers.
  • If you seem to get stuck on top of or between the slopes of two hills, hold a directional input and press the jump key. If you are still unable to move, relaunch the game.
